name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: On The Black Carpet: The Hunger Games Premiere
detailed_description: Go on the “black carpet” of the Hunger Games premiere and hear what the cast has to say about filming the movie.
about_the_game: Go on the “black carpet” of the Hunger Games premiere and hear what the cast has to say about filming the movie.
